featured.text: There would be a real chance of running aground and damaging the ship and the cargo, some of which might be dangerous if released into a water-based ecosystem.

definition.zh_def: 擱淺的，指船隻或物體在水中觸底或停留在淺水區。
definition.en_def: Stuck on the bottom of a body of water; unable to move because it is resting on the ground.
definition.example: The ship ran aground during the storm and had to be rescued.
